metadata.title: CVE-2014-8959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in libraries/gis/GIS_Factory.class.php inthe GIS editor in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.6, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7,and 4.2.x before 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to include andexecute arbitrary local files via a crafted geometry-type parameter.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
